results.title: Effects of co-administration of metformin and evogliptin on cerebral infarct volume in the diabetic rat.
results.text_hl: In the pancreas, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Islet_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018273 @@@islet cell damage@@@ was reduced by co-administration.
